p: The powers of spread of all infectious diseases transmitted by cross infection between hosts increase with increasing density of susceptible population. This would unconditionally also be the case with Filoviridae diseases that are transmitted directly from diseased to healthy persons. Consequently, when Christakos et al. find, nonetheless, that this was not the case with the Black Death, it is due to the erroneous identification of the disease as a Filoviridae and the fallacious use of a mathematical epidemiological model.
